name: Bekar Hexagon
description:
Bekar Hexagon is a very simple Video Game that is inspired by the Original Superhexagon game. You have to save yourself from Colliding with the Hexagon.

Use Left & Right Arrow keys to move the Player

But it's a simple and easy version of that game.  It was made By Brackeys In his 10 Minute video game challenge, But I just Remade it with a few more things.
